86-year-old who broke social distancing space in ER and grabbed IV pole died after being shoved, NYT reports - CNN
articles.description: An 86-year-old woman with dementia who broke coronavirus social distancing guidelines and grabbed onto another patient's IV pole in the emergency room was shoved, fell to the floor and later died of her injuries, the New York Times reported.

articles.title: Coronavirus - how to tell if you have COVID-19 without even knowing it - Express
articles.description: Coronavirus is a deadly infection that's easily spread among the public, and the disease has killed more than 6,000 people in the UK already. Some people may have COVID-19 symptoms or signs without even knowing it - here's how to find out if you're at risk.
